alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 1:06PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Daniels and northeastern Valley Counties through 200 PM MDT... At 106 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Opheim. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scobey, Opheim, Richland, Port Of Scobey, Port Of Opheim, Madoc, Peerless, Four Buttes, West Fork and Glentana. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
